column2: # Show your PDF from the ./www/ folder (works locally & on shinyapps.io)
tags$iframe(src = pdf_file, style = "width:100%; height:85vh; border:none;", title = "Citations PDF")
tags$p(HTML(sprintf("PDF not found: put %s into a www/ folder next to this file.", pdf_file)))

G1;H1;Errorh: object 'output' not found
Error during wrapup: not that many frames on the stack
Error: no more error handlers available (recursive errors?); invoking 'abort' restart
g
